mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter with poem, Richard T. Brown to Mrs. Eleanor P[arke Custis] Lewis, 1850 March 1
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Brown, Richard T.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Brown writes from Jefferson Co. to Eleanor Parke Custis Lewis near Berryville, Clark Co., Virginia. Sends poem that he promised [on Zachary Taylor]--if she likes it, send [Taylor] a copy. Poem is enclosed, entitled "The Crisis, To Gen: Zachary Taylor, President of the United States." Autograph letter signed, 1 page with envelope. Poem, in Brown's hand, 3 pages.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Taylor, Zachary, 1784-1850
